Title: Silverlight master-detail/unit-of-work framework
Description: Silverlight master-detail/unit-of-work framework. This is a library that extend the ObservableCollection<T> of the Silverlight 2 framework for traking entity that has been modified,inserted,deleted. In this way, when you call a wcf service that write data on the database, you can pass (as parameter) only the that must be write on the database.
HomeWiki:
Silverlight master-detail/unit-of-work framework. This is a library that extend
the ObservableCollection<T> of the Silverlight 2 framework for traking entity that
has been modified,inserted,deleted. In this way, when you call a wcf service that
write data on the database, you can pass (as parameter) only the entity that
